1. Which of the following is NOT true about ABS?
column4: It helps increase your stopping distance.

column6: turning right on red is forbidden.

5. HOV lanes:

9. A serious driving offense includes:
column8: an accumulation of 20 or more points assessed for driving violations within the last 25 years.

column2: 10. To drive defensively, you must:
column4: keep one hand on the steering wheel.
column10: use the vehicle ahead as your only points of focus.

column2: 11. To avoid becoming an aggressive driver, you should:
column4: Adjust your schedule to drive during times with the most highway traffic.

column2: 12. Air bags are meant to _________ seat belts.

column4: slow down and enter the intersection.
column8: enter the intersection and then stop.

column2: 14. A 4-way stop sign means:
column4: The first vehicle to reach the intersection should move forward first.
column6: Traffic from all four directions must stop.
column8: There are four stop signs at the intersection.

column6: adults in the backseat are legally required to wear a seat belt.
column8: the driver and passengers in the front seat must wear a seat belt.
